articles.title: Implant allows user to play computer games using mind
articles.description: A quadruple amputee who participated in a brain-machine interface trial has managed to play computer games using only their thoughts, marking a significant milestone in BMI technology development in China.

articles.title: Study Reveals Surprising Side Effects of High-Dose Radiation Therapy
articles.description: In a new study published in Nature, researchers at the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center explore a surprising phenomenon in which high doses of radiation cause growth in existing metastatic tumors that were not directly treated with radiation.

articles.title: The 2025 Canyon Spectral AL gets a new alloy frame
articles.description: Designed to be a versatile long travel trail bike, the Canyon Spectral AL is available in three spec levels and with 29in or mixed wheels.

articles.title: EA is bringing employees back to the office three days per week
articles.description: EA is asking employees to return to the office for three days per week under a hybrid mode. CEO Andrew Wilson and EA Entertainment president Laura Miele sent emails to staff about the change.

articles.title: synchron's brain implant lets users navigate iPhones and iPads using only their minds
articles.description: synchron is the first company to achieve native integration between a brain-computer interface and apple devices.

articles.title: Apple has been granted a design patent for their Vision Pro Strap with Battery Connector while filing two Trademarks in the U.S. & Hong Kong
articles.description: This week Apple was granted a design patent by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office for the Vision Pro’s strap and battery connector. Apple also filed for two trademarks, with one filed in the U.S. and the other in Hong Kong.

articles.title: Apple readies feature that lets Vision Pro users scroll with their eyes
articles.description: [LOS ANGELES] Apple is developing a feature for its Vision Pro headset that lets users scroll through software with their eyes, aiming to enhance the device with a novel interface.

articles.title: EA Pushes Full Return to Office, Effectively Ends Remote Hiring
articles.description: Company moves to "globally consistent, enterprise-wide work model."

articles.title: I drove Aston Martin Vantage Roadster - it’s car which cries out to be driven hard & will get you a nod of appreciation
articles.description: I HAD two choices.Test an open-top Vantage dodging potholes in 20mph Great Britain.Or head to the Austrian Alps where the roads are smooth

articles.title: New PlayStation Handheld Details Leak, Full Portable Console Reportedly Planned for PS6 Launch
articles.description: Insider claims that a full PlayStation handheld console is in development, with Sony aiming to launch it alongside the PlayStation 6.
